General.Name: Princeton Technology Corporation
General.Description: Princeton Technology Corporation engages in the design, development, testing, and sale of consumer integrated circuits (ICs) in Taiwan, Japan, Mainland China, Korea, and internationally. It provides IC technology for energy-saving solutions, including a series of energy-saving ballast driver ICs, LED lighting/backlight driver ICs, and brushless DC motor ICs for use in various indoor/outdoor lighting and motor control products. The company also offers display driver, multimedia audio controller, LED driver, motor driver, RF, encoder/decoder, remote control, and power ICs, as well as ASICs, microcontrollers, and automotive solutions. Its products are used in automotive dashboard and multimedia devices, portable audio players, digital TVs, home audio/video appliances, DSCs, DSLRs, monitoring cameras, and car security systems. Princeton Technology Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
